name: Red's Strange Adventure
description:
Hello, this is the third project on a course am working on, I decided to upload it here since you might like it. 

What is it about: This game is about trying to finish the game as quick as possible it features leaderboards and some levels, It is still early in development and will be updated, and it is currently a bit buggy.

Credits

  • Sprites: Poncho, and this course 

https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/learn/lecture/28710984#questions

  • Button Icons: Mental Checkpoint

https://www.youtube.com/c/MentalCheckpoint

  • Music

Epidemic Sound

  • Rest of the game: Poncho

https://justponcho.carrd.co/

Links, and Projects

Remember you can support me by donating, even 1$ helps a ton, anyways thanks for checking this out and I hope you enjoy it.
